mapper.sql: id, photocard_id, member_id, rating, content, created_at
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.photocard_id, r.member_id, m.nickname, r.rating, r.content, r.created_at FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.id WHERE r.photocard_id = #{photocardId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( photocard_id, member_id, rating, content ) VALUES ( #{photocardId}, #{memberId}, #{rating}, #{content} )
